rows.label: campfev11_000_000_msg0001
rows.name: Laura, about that battle earlier..

rows.label: campfev11_000_000_msg0002
rows.name: My moves were good, weren't they?

rows.label: campfev11_000_000_msg0003
rows.name: Don't push yourself so hard.

rows.label: campfev11_000_000_msg0004
rows.name: Aww, you're not going to praise me...?

rows.label: campfev11_000_000_msg0005
rows.name:
I feel like I'm doing a good job
\drawing out your power.

rows.label: campfev11_000_000_msg0006
rows.name:
That's not the issue.
I'm saying I don't want to see
you get hurt, Laura.

rows.label: campfev11_000_000_msg0007
rows.name:
We've been together
for a long time, right, Shin?

rows.label: campfev11_000_000_msg0008
rows.name:
Ever since I touched your Core Crystal
as a kid, bonded with you,
and became your Driver.

rows.label: campfev11_000_000_msg0009
rows.name: Yeah...

rows.label: campfev11_000_000_msg0010
rows.name:
To me, being a Driver and Blade
is a bond that's even stronger
than family.

rows.label: campfev11_000_000_msg0011
rows.name:
That's why I want us to help each other.
I want to be able to help you, Shin.

rows.label: campfev11_000_000_msg0012
rows.name:
But Laura,
you're the Driver,
and I'm the Blade.

rows.label: campfev11_000_000_msg0013
rows.name:
It's a Blade's job to fight
and protect their Driver.

rows.label: campfev11_000_000_msg0014
rows.name:
A few wounds are nothing to me,
as long as my Core Crystal is safe.

rows.label: campfev11_000_000_msg0015
rows.name: But I'm just a human, on the other hand.

rows.label: campfev11_000_000_msg0016
rows.name:
If a Driver dies,
the Blade returns to its Core Crystal...

rows.label: campfev11_000_000_msg0017
rows.name:
So you're telling me
to be more careful
when I fight, right?

rows.label: campfev11_000_000_msg0018
rows.name: Yes.

rows.label: campfev11_000_000_msg0019
rows.name:
Hmm...
I guess you're right...

rows.label: campfev11_000_000_msg0020
rows.name:
I mean,
it's not like I want
to make you anxious...

rows.label: campfev11_000_000_msg0021
rows.name:
Okay, I promise I won't overdo it.
If it gets dangerous,
I'll let you take over, Shin.

rows.label: campfev11_000_000_msg0022
rows.name: Yeah, please do.

rows.label: campfev11_000_000_msg0023
rows.name: I'm counting on you.

rows.label: campfev11_000_000_msg0024
rows.name:
Of course.
Leave it to me.
